text: David Poisson (31 March 1982 – 13 November 2017) was a French World Cup alpine ski racer. He was born in Annecy, Haute-Savoie, France. Poisson represented France at the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver. At the 2013 World Championships, Poisson made his first podium, taking bronze in the downhill. Poisson died in a crash during training in Nakiska, Alberta, Canada on 13 November 2017, aged 35. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths in sport Category:Olympians for France Category:French skiers Category:Sportspeople from Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes Category:People from Annecy
title: David Poisson
